channel.title: Fix for java c error
channel.description:
I dono if iIam supossed to post this here saw alot of people with problem and I didn't think it qualified for a tut. First fo all make sure u have the lastest version of java. Make sure it is the jdk and not jre. Right click on ur compiler and click edit now paste this.
@echo off title PhoneScape Compiler color B "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

item.title: Fix for java c error
item.dc:creator: @justanoob justanoob
item.description:
@justanoob wrote:

I dono if iIam supossed to post this here saw alot of people with problem and I didn’t think it qualified for a tut. First fo all make sure u have the lastest version of java. Make sure it is the jdk and not jre. Right click on ur compiler and click edit now paste this.

@echo off
title PhoneScape Compiler
color B
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
